Name: Cthulhu: Death Escape / 克苏鲁:死亡逃脱 Prototype
About the game: ADD OFFICIAL RELEASE TO YOUR WISHLIST / Join The Community of Madness! Objectives: Collect Ancient Coins and Find a Way to Open the Exit Mouse - Interact W A S D - Move Shift - Switch Run and Walk Tab - inventory / Show and Hide Cursor Unique Underwater World - Dive Deep to Discover an Unknown Underwater World that No One‘s Been There Before... Danger is in Everywhere - Monsters will randomly cause big troubles and put you in extreme danger. You must hide or run before they find you... Items Respawn Randomly - Every time the situation is different, try your best to collect coins as many as possible... Interactive Dead Body - Dig! Dig! Dig! You may find something in dead bodies by using knives... in the beta version, you can use knives as many times as you can.
